vote.title: Authorize a construction services contract for the Dallas Area Rapid Transit (DART) Signals Group 2B Project to reconstruct two traffic signals at the intersections of South Polk Street at Reynoldston Lane and Ann Arbor Avenue at South Marsalis Avenue - EAR Telecommunications, LLC DBA: EARTC, lowest responsible bidder of four - Not to exceed $878,832.50 - Financing: DART Transportation Projects Fund
